name: Five Nights at Sock Monkey Museum 7 Nightmare Before Monkey REMASTERED
name_original: Five Nights at Sock Monkey Museum 7 Nightmare Before Monkey REMASTERED
description:
this a game from my scratch account. Nightmare Before Monkey was on scratch for 5 days before being taking down by scratch so i made a remastered  version of the game by updating all sprites , new jumpscares ,  new jumpscares sounds and other new stuff.

if you want to play the original game the link to it is here 

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/776535085/
